version_description:
New Features!
More tools are available for player communications!

- Home Feed
- Home Level
- Bookmark
- Activity List
- MetaTag support in comments

[ Easy Level Sharing]
Sharing levels with your friends is super easy now! Simply click the "Share" button to share your level outside of the app!
Other players can click the link to directly navigate to your level.

[Updated Video Sharing]

This is One Year Anniversary! We made lots of changes since the last release.

[Emblem System]
You can design your own emblems and gift them to other players.
Build the community and build friendship!

[Tag System]
Add a tag to your l

- "Hell Campaign" is added!
- "Wind Block" is added!
- New Skins and Researches!
- Unique BGM is set for each theme!

Added new campaigns, blocks and characters!
Try the latest water block and tell us how you like it!
